item.title: Standard and High-Performance VPN Gateway SKUs will be retired on 30 September 2025
item.description: Standard and High-Performance VPN Gateway SKUs are retiring on September 30th, 2025
item.atom:content: Standard and High-Performance VPN Gateway SKUs are retiring on September 30th, 2025

item.title: Pod Security Policy is being deprecated with AKS 1.25 and 2023-06-01 API version
item.description: Migrate your AKS cluster from Pod Security Policy to Pod Security Admission
item.atom:content: Migrate your AKS cluster from Pod Security Policy to Pod Security Admission

item.title: Azure Object Anchors Retirement
item.description: Please note that Azure Object Anchors (AOA) will be retired on May 20, 2024. Object anchoring capability is generally available (GA) in Dynamics 365 Guides.
item.atom:content: Please note that Azure Object Anchors (AOA) will be retired on May 20, 2024. Object anchoring capability is generally available (GA) in Dynamics 365 Guides.

item.title: Azure Spatial Anchors Retirement
item.description: Please note that Azure Spatial Anchors (ASA) will be retired on November 20, 2024.
item.atom:content: Please note that Azure Spatial Anchors (ASA) will be retired on November 20, 2024.

item.title: Application Insights Availability Tests TLS 1.3 Enablement
item.description: TLS 1.3 will be enabled for Availability Tests in Azure Monitor Application Insights starting on 4 December 2023
item.atom:content: TLS 1.3 will be enabled for Availability Tests in Azure Monitor Application Insights starting on 4 December 2023

item.title: Generally available: Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry-based Distro for ASP.NET Core Applications
item.description: Use OpenTelemetry-based instrumentation with vender-neutral APIs to power metrics, logs, and distributed traces in Azure Monitor application insights.
item.atom:content: Use OpenTelemetry-based instrumentation with vender-neutral APIs to power metrics, logs, and distributed traces in Azure Monitor application insights.

item.title: Public preview: Azure NetApp Files support for 1 TiB capacity pools
item.description: Azure NetApp Files 1 TiB capacity pool sizes, when used with volumes using standard network features is now in preview.
item.atom:content: Azure NetApp Files 1 TiB capacity pool sizes, when used with volumes using standard network features is now in preview.

item.title: General Availability: Azure NetApp Files support for 2 TiB capacity pools
item.description: Azure NetApp Files now supports smaller 2 TiB capacity pool sizes, lowered from 4 TiB, when used with volumes using standard network features.
item.atom:content: Azure NetApp Files now supports smaller 2 TiB capacity pool sizes, lowered from 4 TiB, when used with volumes using standard network features.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Automation supports PowerShell 7.2 runbooks
item.description: Azure Automation supports PowerShell 7.2 runbooks (General Availability).
item.atom:content: Azure Automation supports PowerShell 7.2 runbooks (General Availability).

item.title: Announcing General Availability of Microsoft Defender for APIs
item.description: The general availability of Defender for APIs, a new offering as part of Microsoft Defender for Cloud, that helps organizations prevent, detect, and respond to API threats with an integrated cloud security context.
item.atom:content: The general availability of Defender for APIs, a new offering as part of Microsoft Defender for Cloud, that helps organizations prevent, detect, and respond to API threats with an integrated cloud security context.

item.title: Public Preview: Create and manage Azure Monitor managed Prometheus rules in Azure portal
item.description: You can now create and manage Azure Managed Prometheus rule groups, alert rules and recording rules in the Azure Portal
item.atom:content: You can now create and manage Azure Managed Prometheus rule groups, alert rules and recording rules in the Azure Portal

item.title: Extended support for .NET 6 (LTS) ends on 12 November 2024
item.description: Extended support for .NET 6 (LTS) ends 12 November 2024 - upgrade your apps to .NET 8 (LTS)
item.atom:content: Extended support for .NET 6 (LTS) ends 12 November 2024 - upgrade your apps to .NET 8 (LTS)

item.title: Extended support for .NET 7 (STS) ends on 14 May 2024
item.description: Extended support for .NET 7 (STS) ends on 14 May 2024 - upgrade your apps to .NET 8 (LTS)
item.atom:content: Extended support for .NET 7 (STS) ends on 14 May 2024 - upgrade your apps to .NET 8 (LTS)

item.title: General Availability - Azure Backup for AKS
item.description: Azure Backup is announcing General Availability of Azure Backup for AKS allowing customers to protect their applications by providing ability to backup and restore AKS clusters.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup is announcing General Availability of Azure Backup for AKS allowing customers to protect their applications by providing ability to backup and restore AKS clusters.

item.title: Public Preview: Kafka Input and Output with Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: You can connect directly to Kafka to ingest from Kafka clusters or output data to Kafka clusters in your Azure Stream Analytics (ASA) job.
item.atom:content: You can connect directly to Kafka to ingest from Kafka clusters or output data to Kafka clusters in your Azure Stream Analytics (ASA) job.

item.title: Public preview: Schema migration for target Azure SQL DB
item.description: Transfer your database schema from source to target Azure SQL DB using DMS from the Azure Portal.
item.atom:content: Transfer your database schema from source to target Azure SQL DB using DMS from the Azure Portal.

item.title: Public Preview Preview: Protocol Buffers (Protobuf) with Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: You can ingest events in protobuf format into Azure Stream Analytics using a built-in deserializer.
item.atom:content: You can ingest events in protobuf format into Azure Stream Analytics using a built-in deserializer.

item.title: General availability: Azure Portal experience for Azure Database Migration Service
item.description: The new Azure Portal experience for Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) allows you to perform seamless migrations from SQL Server on-premises to Azure SQL Targets using DMS.
item.atom:content: The new Azure Portal experience for Azure Database Migration Service (DMS) allows you to perform seamless migrations from SQL Server on-premises to Azure SQL Targets using DMS.

item.title: General availability: SKU recommendation in Azure SQL Migration extension - Azure Data Studio
item.description: Support for SKU recommendation in the Azure SQL Migration extension for Azure Data Studio is in GA.
item.atom:content: Support for SKU recommendation in the Azure SQL Migration extension for Azure Data Studio is in GA.

item.title: General Availability: pgvector 0.5.1 extension
item.description: Pgvector 0.5.1, includes support for HSNW indexing, l1_distance, and sum aggregates since the prior supported version 0.4.0
item.atom:content: Pgvector 0.5.1, includes support for HSNW indexing, l1_distance, and sum aggregates since the prior supported version 0.4.0

item.title: Public Preview: Server logs for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Enhance your database monitoring with the new server log feature for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, offering customizable retention and straightforward downloading for operational excellence.
item.atom:content: Enhance your database monitoring with the new server log feature for Azure Database for PostgreSQL, offering customizable retention and straightforward downloading for operational excellence.

item.title: General availability: Time travel in Azure Synapse Link for Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: We are announcing the general availability of the time travel capability in Azure Synapse Link for Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL and MongoDB API.
item.atom:content: We are announcing the general availability of the time travel capability in Azure Synapse Link for Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL and MongoDB API.

item.title: General availability: Change data capture in Azure Cosmos DB analytical store
item.description: We are announcing the general availability of the CDC capability from Azure Cosmos DB analytical store.
item.atom:content: We are announcing the general availability of the CDC capability from Azure Cosmos DB analytical store.

item.title: General Availability of Azure App Configuration Kubernetes Provider
item.description: Azure App Configuration Kubernetes Provider lets you centrally configure the applications running in Kubernetes clusters. The latest version offers workload identity authentication in the provider and dynamic refresh of the configuration data.
item.atom:content: Azure App Configuration Kubernetes Provider lets you centrally configure the applications running in Kubernetes clusters. The latest version offers workload identity authentication in the provider and dynamic refresh of the configuration data.

item.title: General Availability: User and group quota management in Azure NetApp Files
item.description: Default and individual user/group quotas allows you to stay in control of capacity consumption on volumes; the feature is now Generally Available (GA)
item.atom:content: Default and individual user/group quotas allows you to stay in control of capacity consumption on volumes; the feature is now Generally Available (GA)

item.title: General Availability: Standard network features support in US Gov regions
item.description: Standard network features for azure NetApp files are now available in the US Gov regions
item.atom:content: Standard network features for azure NetApp files are now available in the US Gov regions

item.title: Generally available: Azure Static Web Apps now supports .NET 8
item.description: Azure Static Web Apps now supports .NET 8, enabling you to build and deploy frontend and full-stack .NET 8 web applications. With .NET 8 support, you can build and deploy Blazor WebAssembly apps to Azure Static Web Apps. You can also deploy .NET 8 managed functions to your Azure Static Web Apps.
item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps now supports .NET 8, enabling you to build and deploy frontend and full-stack .NET 8 web applications. With .NET 8 support, you can build and deploy Blazor WebAssembly apps to Azure Static Web Apps. You can also deploy .NET 8 managed functions to your Azure Static Web Apps.

item.title: Public Preview: Encryption using Customer Managed Keys for Backup Vaults
item.description: Encryption of data in Backup vaults using Customer Managed Keys is now in Public Preview.
item.atom:content: Encryption of data in Backup vaults using Customer Managed Keys is now in Public Preview.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Red Hat OpenShift in Italy North
item.description: Azure Red Hat OpenShift is now available in Italy North region.
item.atom:content: Azure Red Hat OpenShift is now available in Italy North region.

item.title: General availability: Azure Monitor Application Insights Browser SDK Loader for Node.js
item.description: Azure Monitor Application Insights Node.js customers can enable real user monitoring (RUM) with a simple configuration.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Application Insights Node.js customers can enable real user monitoring (RUM) with a simple configuration.

item.title: General Availability: Encryption at host for Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks
item.description: Encryption at host for Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks
item.atom:content: Encryption at host for Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks

item.title: Azure Web PubSub support for Socket.IO now generally available
item.description: Use your preferred Socket.IO APIs, while letting Azure handle messages and scaling for you
item.atom:content: Use your preferred Socket.IO APIs, while letting Azure handle messages and scaling for you

item.title: Generally Available: Collect Syslog from AKS nodes using Azure Monitor Container Insights
item.description: The Syslog collection feature in Azure Monitor - Container Insights is generally available.
item.atom:content: The Syslog collection feature in Azure Monitor - Container Insights is generally available.

item.title: Part numbers from EA invoice are now added to the cost and usage file.
item.description: All records in cost and usage file will now match the part numbers in an invoice for EA customers. This will allow leveraging the part number to match invoice and cost details data. Please note that when comparing charges, refunds for purchases done in past billing periods should be excluded.
item.atom:content: All records in cost and usage file will now match the part numbers in an invoice for EA customers. This will allow leveraging the part number to match invoice and cost details data. Please note that when comparing charges, refunds for purchases done in past billing periods should be excluded.

item.title: Part numbers from EA invoice are now added to the cost and usage file.
item.description: All records in cost and usage file will now match the part numbers in an invoice for EA customers. This will allow leveraging the part number to match invoice and cost details data. Please note that when comparing charges, refunds for purchases done in past billing periods should be excluded.
item.atom:content: All records in cost and usage file will now match the part numbers in an invoice for EA customers. This will allow leveraging the part number to match invoice and cost details data. Please note that when comparing charges, refunds for purchases done in past billing periods should be excluded.

item.title: Generally available: Delete Jobs API to support bulk delete in Azure Digital Twins
item.description: GA release for bulk delete support for Azure Digital Twins
item.atom:content: GA release for bulk delete support for Azure Digital Twins

item.title: General availability: Reservations for Microsoft Fabric
item.description: You can now save up to 40.5% on Microsoft Fabric capacity when you commit to one-year reservations.
item.atom:content: You can now save up to 40.5% on Microsoft Fabric capacity when you commit to one-year reservations.

item.title: Generally Available: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.3 now supported on Azure Virtual Machines
item.description: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9.3, the latest version of RHEL 9 from Red Hat is now generally available on Azure Virtual Machines (VMs). Availability of RHEL 9.3 for VMs on Azure is a step forward towards offering a more scalable, flexible Linux platform that pairs container innovation with a strong security posture.
item.atom:content: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9.3, the latest version of RHEL 9 from Red Hat is now generally available on Azure Virtual Machines (VMs). Availability of RHEL 9.3 for VMs on Azure is a step forward towards offering a more scalable, flexible Linux platform that pairs container innovation with a strong security posture.

item.title: General availability: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent support with Connection Monitor
item.description: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent support in Connection Monitor for monitoring connectivity across ARC enabled endpoints as sources and destinations
item.atom:content: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent support in Connection Monitor for monitoring connectivity across ARC enabled endpoints as sources and destinations

item.title: Public preview: Private subnet
item.description: Private subnet is a new feature that allows you to create subnets that prevent the creation of insecure default outbound public IP address creation
item.atom:content: Private subnet is a new feature that allows you to create subnets that prevent the creation of insecure default outbound public IP address creation

item.title: Public Preview: Attach and VMs to and from Existing Virtual Machine Scale Sets
item.description: You can now easily bring existing VMs to an existing Virtual Machine Scale Set with Flexible Orchestration Mode to take advantage of the scaling orchestrations offered by scale sets. You can now detach a VM from the scale set for isolation and troubleshooting.
item.atom:content: You can now easily bring existing VMs to an existing Virtual Machine Scale Set with Flexible Orchestration Mode to take advantage of the scaling orchestrations offered by scale sets. You can now detach a VM from the scale set for isolation and troubleshooting.

item.title: General Availability of Azure Logic Apps' New Data Mapper for Visual Studio Code
item.description: Data Mapper is Azure Logic Apps' new visual data transformation tool. Now, in general availability, as a Visual Studio Code extension, it can create and edit maps between source and target schemas.
item.atom:content: Data Mapper is Azure Logic Apps' new visual data transformation tool. Now, in general availability, as a Visual Studio Code extension, it can create and edit maps between source and target schemas.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Mv3 Medium Memory (MM) Virtual Machines
item.description: Get improved performance and higher reliability for your memory-optimized workloads with the public preview of the new generation Mv3 Medium Memory (MM) Virtual Machines.
item.atom:content: Get improved performance and higher reliability for your memory-optimized workloads with the public preview of the new generation Mv3 Medium Memory (MM) Virtual Machines.

item.title: Azure Logic Apps Standard VS Code Extension Installation Enhancements in public preview
item.description: Currently, in public preview starting from version 2.80.0, the installation process of the VS Code Extension for Azure Logic Apps Standard will be significantly simplified. The extension will automatically identify and install any required dependencies, such as other extensions or frameworks. This will also encompass all the necessary extensions, including the C# extension essential for debugging.
item.atom:content: Currently, in public preview starting from version 2.80.0, the installation process of the VS Code Extension for Azure Logic Apps Standard will be significantly simplified. The extension will automatically identify and install any required dependencies, such as other extensions or frameworks. This will also encompass all the necessary extensions, including the C# extension essential for debugging.

item.title: General Availability of Application Insights Enhancements for Azure Logic Apps (standard)
item.description: We are also excited to announce the general availability of Application Insights Enhancements for Azure Logic Apps (standard). This new capability gives you a simplified experience for discovering insights about your Logic App workflows and more control over filtering events at the source and reducing your storage costs.
item.atom:content: We are also excited to announce the general availability of Application Insights Enhancements for Azure Logic Apps (standard). This new capability gives you a simplified experience for discovering insights about your Logic App workflows and more control over filtering events at the source and reducing your storage costs.

item.title: Announcing general availability of .NET Framework Custom Code for Azure Logic Apps (standard)
item.description: We are pleased to announce the general availability of .NET Framework Custom Code for Azure Logic Apps (standard). This capability allows customers to extend their low-code solutions with the power of custom code.
item.atom:content: We are pleased to announce the general availability of .NET Framework Custom Code for Azure Logic Apps (standard). This capability allows customers to extend their low-code solutions with the power of custom code.

item.title: Announcing Azure Integration Environment in public preview
item.description: We are excited to introduce a new Azure service that provides unified experience to help customers effectively manage and monitor their integration resources. This service comprises two core components: the Azure Integration Environment and Business Process Tracking, both currently in public preview.
item.atom:content: We are excited to introduce a new Azure service that provides unified experience to help customers effectively manage and monitor their integration resources. This service comprises two core components: the Azure Integration Environment and Business Process Tracking, both currently in public preview.

item.title: Azure Logic Apps workflow assistant in public preview
item.description: Bringing the power of AI to Azure Logic Apps for the first time, this workflow assistant answers any questions you have about Azure Logic Apps from directly within the designer. Currently in public preview, this chat interface provides access to Azure Logic Apps documentation and best practices without requiring you to navigate documentation or search online forums.
item.atom:content: Bringing the power of AI to Azure Logic Apps for the first time, this workflow assistant answers any questions you have about Azure Logic Apps from directly within the designer. Currently in public preview, this chat interface provides access to Azure Logic Apps documentation and best practices without requiring you to navigate documentation or search online forums.

item.category: Azure Database for PostgreSQL; Azure Backup
item.title: Public preview: Azure Backup supports long term retention for backup of Azure Database for PostgreSQL– Flexible Server
item.description: Now you can retain backups for up to 10 years by defining your own backup and retention policy for PostgreSQL- Flexible server.
item.atom:content: Now you can retain backups for up to 10 years by defining your own backup and retention policy for PostgreSQL- Flexible server.

item.title: GA: Ultra Disk performance updates
item.description: Azure Ultra Disk Storage now provides maximum throughput of up to 10 GBps and IOPS of up to 400K IOPS per disk.
item.atom:content: Azure Ultra Disk Storage now provides maximum throughput of up to 10 GBps and IOPS of up to 400K IOPS per disk.

item.title: GA: Stateful entities in Durable Functions on the isolated worker model for .NET
item.description: The stateful entities feature for Durable Functions is now available for .NET apps on the isolated worker model.
item.atom:content: The stateful entities feature for Durable Functions is now available for .NET apps on the isolated worker model.

item.title: Azure Container Storage is now available with Azure Linux container host
item.description: Azure Container Storage (in preview) offers volume management built natively for containers. With the latest update, you can deploy Azure Container Storage on Azure Linux container host.
item.atom:content: Azure Container Storage (in preview) offers volume management built natively for containers. With the latest update, you can deploy Azure Container Storage on Azure Linux container host.

item.title: Azure Functions brings new flexibility with unlimited execution time
item.description: You can now request for access to try out Flex Consumption, a new Azure Functions hosting plan that provides fast scaling and networking features with a serverless billing model.
item.atom:content: You can now request for access to try out Flex Consumption, a new Azure Functions hosting plan that provides fast scaling and networking features with a serverless billing model.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure IoT Operations
item.description: Azure IoT Operations is now in Public Preview. Azure IoT Operations addresses an enterprise’s fundamental needs, but also wrangles edge data to generate local insights and brings interoperability and scalability to IoT solutions.
item.atom:content: Azure IoT Operations is now in Public Preview. Azure IoT Operations addresses an enterprise’s fundamental needs, but also wrangles edge data to generate local insights and brings interoperability and scalability to IoT solutions.

item.title: Generally available: Partitioned namespaces for Azure Service Bus Premium
item.description: Partitoned namespaces for Azure Service Bus, allowing the use of partitioning for the premium messaging tier, is now generally available.
item.atom:content: Partitoned namespaces for Azure Service Bus, allowing the use of partitioning for the premium messaging tier, is now generally available.

item.title: Public preview: Cost analysis add-on for AKS
item.description: You now have increased visibility and transparency into cluster costs.
item.atom:content: You now have increased visibility and transparency into cluster costs.

item.title: Public preview: Vector database add-ons for Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now get started quickly with cognitive search using Azure Container Apps and its native integration with three popular open source vector database variants.
item.atom:content: You can now get started quickly with cognitive search using Azure Container Apps and its native integration with three popular open source vector database variants.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Container Apps adds native support for CNCF Buildpacks to automatically containerize your code
item.description: You can now focus on your code and quickly take your application from source to cloud. There’s no need to understand containers or how to package application code for deployment.
item.atom:content: You can now focus on your code and quickly take your application from source to cloud. There’s no need to understand containers or how to package application code for deployment.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Container Apps Landing Zone Accelerator
item.description: You can now provision Container Apps with workload profiles securely at an enterprise scale with a landing zone.
item.atom:content: You can now provision Container Apps with workload profiles securely at an enterprise scale with a landing zone.

item.title: Public preview: Policy-driven resiliency in Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now use and customize policies that provide high value resiliency capabilities and apply them to your Container Apps.
item.atom:content: You can now use and customize policies that provide high value resiliency capabilities and apply them to your Container Apps.

item.title: Public preview: Dedicated GPU workload profiles
item.description: You can now run GPU-enabled workloads in Azure Container Apps.
item.atom:content: You can now run GPU-enabled workloads in Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Kubernetes AI toolchain operator
item.description: You can now more easily deploy machine learning (ML) models on AKS using the Kubernetes AI toolchain operator.
item.atom:content: You can now more easily deploy machine learning (ML) models on AKS using the Kubernetes AI toolchain operator.

item.title: GA: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager
item.description: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager is now generally available and offers an update orchestration feature so you can create an update strategy once and reference it in multiple update runs.
item.atom:content: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager is now generally available and offers an update orchestration feature so you can create an update strategy once and reference it in multiple update runs.

item.title: Preview: New Basic SKU functionality for Azure confidential ledger
item.description: The Azure confidential ledger Basic SKU gated preview will allow select customers using other Azure products to uplevel integrity protection by storing periodic data, blobs, and application signatures in Azure confidential ledger.
item.atom:content: The Azure confidential ledger Basic SKU gated preview will allow select customers using other Azure products to uplevel integrity protection by storing periodic data, blobs, and application signatures in Azure confidential ledger.

item.title: Azure Chaos Studio is now generally available
item.description: The general availability of Azure Chaos Studios provides a fully managed experimentation platform for discovering challenging issues through experiment templates, dynamic targets and a more guided user interface.
item.atom:content: The general availability of Azure Chaos Studios provides a fully managed experimentation platform for discovering challenging issues through experiment templates, dynamic targets and a more guided user interface.

item.title: Generally available: AMD confidential VM option for Azure Databricks
item.description: Users can now select AMD-based confidential VMs for their Azure Databricks cluster driver node and cluster worker nodes.
item.atom:content: Users can now select AMD-based confidential VMs for their Azure Databricks cluster driver node and cluster worker nodes.

item.title: Announcing Azure API Management Credential Manager: Azure API Management Authorizations Renamed
item.description: We're thrilled to introduce the rebranding and feature enhancements of Azure API Management's Credential Manager, formerly known as Authorizations. The updated Credential Manager now boasts additional capabilities for user-delegated permissions.
item.atom:content: We're thrilled to introduce the rebranding and feature enhancements of Azure API Management's Credential Manager, formerly known as Authorizations. The updated Credential Manager now boasts additional capabilities for user-delegated permissions.

item.title: Public Preview: Announcing the preview of Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework
item.description: Deploy and build decentralized governance applications with granular confidentiality amongst members.
item.atom:content: Deploy and build decentralized governance applications with granular confidentiality amongst members.

item.title: Preview: Azure confidential VMs with NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs
item.description: Azure confidential VMs with NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs is open for preview. Please use the sign-up at aka.ms/accgpusignup for your onboarding request.
item.atom:content: Azure confidential VMs with NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs is open for preview. Please use the sign-up at aka.ms/accgpusignup for your onboarding request.

item.title: Public preview: Confidential containers on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: AKS now lets you run individual pods in their own trusted execution environment (TEE)
item.atom:content: AKS now lets you run individual pods in their own trusted execution environment (TEE)

item.title: Public preview: Confidential temp disk encryption for confidential VMs
item.description: Confidential temp disk encryption is now available for all confidential VMs.
item.atom:content: Confidential temp disk encryption is now available for all confidential VMs.

item.title: Public Preview: New Marketplace app for Storage customers and feature enhancements to portal for Azure confidential ledger
item.description: Storage customers will now be able to use a marketplace application to connect their immutable blobs with enhanced integrity protection from Azure confidential ledger. Signatures from blobs will be stored and validated, as needed. In addition, the Azure confidential ledger portal experience has been enhanced to allow exploring transactions and retrieving cryptographic proof.
item.atom:content: Storage customers will now be able to use a marketplace application to connect their immutable blobs with enhanced integrity protection from Azure confidential ledger. Signatures from blobs will be stored and validated, as needed. In addition, the Azure confidential ledger portal experience has been enhanced to allow exploring transactions and retrieving cryptographic proof.

item.title: Preview: Disk Integrity Tool for confidential VMs in Azure
item.description: The disk integrity tool for confidential VMs is now in preview. This enables you to measure and attest that your OS disk is launched as expected.
item.atom:content: The disk integrity tool for confidential VMs is now in preview. This enables you to measure and attest that your OS disk is launched as expected.

item.title: Generally Available: Trusted launch as default for VMs deployed through PowerShell and CLI
item.description: Trusted launch is now enabled by default for VMs deployed through PowerShell and CLI, enhancing the foundational security of these VMs.
item.atom:content: Trusted launch is now enabled by default for VMs deployed through PowerShell and CLI, enhancing the foundational security of these VMs.

item.title: Public Preview: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9.3 support for AMD-based confidential VMs
item.description: RHEL 9.3 is now available in public preview as the guest OS for all AMD-based confidential VMs.
item.atom:content: RHEL 9.3 is now available in public preview as the guest OS for all AMD-based confidential VMs.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - Public Preview for November
item.description: Three features now available in public preview enable you to choose which models/datasets are right for you without having to run any job, seamlessly read/write data from a Fabric datastore; and Model-as-a-Service with inference APIs and hosted fine-tuning.
item.atom:content: Three features now available in public preview enable you to choose which models/datasets are right for you without having to run any job, seamlessly read/write data from a Fabric datastore; and Model-as-a-Service with inference APIs and hosted fine-tuning.

item.title: Generally Available: AMD confidential VMs in new regions for November 2023
item.description: AMD confidential VMs now in Italy North, Germany West Central, UAE North.
item.atom:content: AMD confidential VMs now in Italy North, Germany West Central, UAE North.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - General Availability for November
item.description: Five features now available in GA enable you to search thousands of OSS LLMs, provide a feature set specification and let the system handle the rest, and lower. compute management overhead and setup costs. You can also now deploy complex compute graphs under batch endpoints, and use one platform to build, tune, evaluate, deploy, and test AI workflows.
item.atom:content: Five features now available in GA enable you to search thousands of OSS LLMs, provide a feature set specification and let the system handle the rest, and lower. compute management overhead and setup costs. You can also now deploy complex compute graphs under batch endpoints, and use one platform to build, tune, evaluate, deploy, and test AI workflows.

item.title: General availability: Azure AI Advantage for Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: Today, we are excited to announce the Azure AI Advantage customer offer.
item.atom:content: Today, we are excited to announce the Azure AI Advantage customer offer.

item.title: Announcing the public preview of Azure confidential VMs with Intel TDX
item.description: Microsoft is excited to announce the public preview of DCesv5 and ECesv5-series confidential VMs. These VMs are powered by 4th Generation Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors with Intel® Trust Domain Extensions (TDX). They enable organizations to bring confidential workloads to the cloud without code changes to applications and will be available starting December 1st.
item.atom:content: Microsoft is excited to announce the public preview of DCesv5 and ECesv5-series confidential VMs. These VMs are powered by 4th Generation Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors with Intel® Trust Domain Extensions (TDX). They enable organizations to bring confidential workloads to the cloud without code changes to applications and will be available starting December 1st.

item.title: Public preview: Online Disaster recovery between SQL Server 2022 and Azure SQL Managed Instance
item.description: Managed online disaster recovery between SQL Server 2022 and Azure SQL Managed Instance allows near real-time database replication and bidirectional online failover to Azure and back.
item.atom:content: Managed online disaster recovery between SQL Server 2022 and Azure SQL Managed Instance allows near real-time database replication and bidirectional online failover to Azure and back.

item.title: General Availability: November 2022 Feature Wave for Azure SQL Managed Instance
item.description: The November 2022 Feature Wave for Azure SQL Managed Instance is now available for all subscription types for instances running in new subnets. It includes faster provisioning, zone redundancy, start/stop and support for distributed transactions.
item.atom:content: The November 2022 Feature Wave for Azure SQL Managed Instance is now available for all subscription types for instances running in new subnets. It includes faster provisioning, zone redundancy, start/stop and support for distributed transactions.

item.title: General availability: Azure SQL Database Always Encrypted with virtualization-based security (VBS) enclaves
item.description: VBS enclaves in Azure SQL Database brings the benefits of secure enclaves, rich confidential queries, and in-place cryptographic operations, to all Azure SQL Database offerings, independent from the underlying hardware.
item.atom:content: VBS enclaves in Azure SQL Database brings the benefits of secure enclaves, rich confidential queries, and in-place cryptographic operations, to all Azure SQL Database offerings, independent from the underlying hardware.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for mid-November 2023
item.description: Public Preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-November 2023.
item.atom:content: Public Preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-November 2023.

item.title: General availability: Azure SQL updates for mid-November 2023
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-November 2023.
item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-November 2023.

item.title: New user interface experience for Azure SQL migration extension
item.description: The Azure SQL Migration, an Azure Data Studio extension powered by Azure Database Migration Service, now has a new improved UI experience.
item.atom:content: The Azure SQL Migration, an Azure Data Studio extension powered by Azure Database Migration Service, now has a new improved UI experience.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra Feature Updates
item.description: New preview features available including vector search, turnkey major version upgrades, turnkey replication, and write-through cache!
item.atom:content: New preview features available including vector search, turnkey major version upgrades, turnkey replication, and write-through cache!

item.title: Public Preview: Long Term Retention for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Benefit from long term data retention and improved compliance using Azure Backup.
item.atom:content: Benefit from long term data retention and improved compliance using Azure Backup.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Database for PostgreSQL extension for Azure AI
item.description: Leverage integrated Azure AI services to build intelligent apps in Azure Database for PostgreSQL.
item.atom:content: Leverage integrated Azure AI services to build intelligent apps in Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Database for PostgreSQL Networking with private endpoints
item.description: We are announcing public preview of networking with private endpoints for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.
item.atom:content: We are announcing public preview of networking with private endpoints for Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Public Preview: Enhanced performance and scalability in Azure Database for PostgreSQL
item.description: Benefit from the enhanced performance and scalability of Azure Database for PostgreSQL to improve mission-critical workloads.
item.atom:content: Benefit from the enhanced performance and scalability of Azure Database for PostgreSQL to improve mission-critical workloads.

item.title: General availability: Free tier on Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
item.description: Unlock your potential with our free tier. Start building, testing, and growing your projects without any upfront costs. Scale up when you're ready for more.
item.atom:content: Unlock your potential with our free tier. Start building, testing, and growing your projects without any upfront costs. Scale up when you're ready for more.

item.title: General availability: Vector search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
item.description: Unlock next-level AI applications with native vector similarity search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore.
item.atom:content: Unlock next-level AI applications with native vector similarity search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore offers a fully-managed database for your MongoDB workloads and AI applications, backed by native Azure integrations, flexible pricing, and seamless migration capabilities.
item.atom:content: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore offers a fully-managed database for your MongoDB workloads and AI applications, backed by native Azure integrations, flexible pricing, and seamless migration capabilities.

item.title: Public preview: Priority-based execution in Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: Priority-based execution in Azure Cosmos DB enables customers to prioritize critical high priority requests for execution during high traffic, while potentially throttling low priority requests.
item.atom:content: Priority-based execution in Azure Cosmos DB enables customers to prioritize critical high priority requests for execution during high traffic, while potentially throttling low priority requests.

item.title: Public preview: Cross-account container copy for Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL API
item.description: You can use offline cross-account container copy to migrate data across Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL API accounts seamlessly using Azure CLI.
item.atom:content: You can use offline cross-account container copy to migrate data across Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL API accounts seamlessly using Azure CLI.

item.title: Public preview: Dynamic scaling per partition and per region
item.description: Autoscale gets even better with two new improvements -- scaling per partition and per region!
item.atom:content: Autoscale gets even better with two new improvements -- scaling per partition and per region!

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Open AI “Use your data” integration with Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
item.description: Now you can easily leverage your data stored in Azure Cosmos DB for Mongo DB vCore for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with Azure OpenAI models using the "Use your data" feature in Azure OpenAI Studio.
item.atom:content: Now you can easily leverage your data stored in Azure Cosmos DB for Mongo DB vCore for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with Azure OpenAI models using the "Use your data" feature in Azure OpenAI Studio.

item.title: Public preview: Microsoft Copilot for Azure capability now available in Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: Turn your questions into Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL queries with Microsoft Copilot for Azure.
item.atom:content: Turn your questions into Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL queries with Microsoft Copilot for Azure.

item.title: Public preview: Bring enhanced manageability to your SQL Server anywhere with Azure Arc
item.description: Azure Arc provides enhanced manageability for SQL Server, on-premises or across multi-cloud, to enable better visibility, flexibility and security.
item.atom:content: Azure Arc provides enhanced manageability for SQL Server, on-premises or across multi-cloud, to enable better visibility, flexibility and security.

item.title: Azure Virtual Network Manager Security Admin Rule generally available in select regions
item.description: Azure Virtual Network Manager's security admin rule configuration is now generally available in select regions, empowering users to enforce security rules across their virtual networks globally.
item.atom:content: Azure Virtual Network Manager's security admin rule configuration is now generally available in select regions, empowering users to enforce security rules across their virtual networks globally.

item.title: Public preview: Enabling Rate Limiting on ExpressRoute Direct Circuits
item.description: With ExpressRoute Direct, you can enable rate-limiting for your circuit to match the traffic volume with the configured bandwidth rate.
item.atom:content: With ExpressRoute Direct, you can enable rate-limiting for your circuit to match the traffic volume with the configured bandwidth rate.

item.title: Public preview: Customer-controlled maintenance
item.description: Customers can now use configurable maintenance windows to schedule gateway maintenance at a time that is most convenient for their business.
item.atom:content: Customers can now use configurable maintenance windows to schedule gateway maintenance at a time that is most convenient for their business.

item.title: General Availability: Lower pricing for Azure SQL Database Hyperscale expected in December 2023
item.description: Build new and highly scalable applications on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale with lower pricing!
item.atom:content: Build new and highly scalable applications on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale with lower pricing!

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB Migration for MongoDB extension - Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore migration capability
item.description: Migrate MongoDB workloads to Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore using Azure Cosmos DB Migration for MongoDB extension in Azure Data Studio.
item.atom:content: Migrate MongoDB workloads to Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore using Azure Cosmos DB Migration for MongoDB extension in Azure Data Studio.

item.title: Public preview: ExpressRoute Seamless Gateway Migration
item.description: ExpressRoute customers can now seamlessly migrate.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute customers can now seamlessly migrate.

item.title: Public preview: ExpressRoute Scalable Gateway
item.description: The ExpressRoute virtual network gateway facilitates both management and control plane connectivity to Virtual Machines and Private Endpoints over ExpressRoute.
item.atom:content: The ExpressRoute virtual network gateway facilitates both management and control plane connectivity to Virtual Machines and Private Endpoints over ExpressRoute.

item.title: General availability: ExpressRoute Direct and Circuit in different subscriptions
item.description: ExpressRoute Direct customers can now generate an authorization key for your ExpressRoute Direct resource and use it to make an ExpressRoute Circuit in a different subscription.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute Direct customers can now generate an authorization key for your ExpressRoute Direct resource and use it to make an ExpressRoute Circuit in a different subscription.

item.title: General availability: ExpressRoute as a Trusted Service
item.description: ExpressRoute customers can now store MACSec secrets in an Azure KeyVault.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute customers can now store MACSec secrets in an Azure KeyVault.

item.title: Public preview: Microsoft Copilot for Azure
item.description: Simplify how you design, operate, optimize, and troubleshoot apps and infrastructure from cloud to edge with Microsoft Copilot for Azure.
item.atom:content: Simplify how you design, operate, optimize, and troubleshoot apps and infrastructure from cloud to edge with Microsoft Copilot for Azure.

item.title: MQTT broker feature, PubSub capabilities now available for Azure Event Grid
item.description: Bi-directional communication and flexible consumption patterns - at scale.
item.atom:content: Bi-directional communication and flexible consumption patterns - at scale.

item.title: Introducing New Capabilities in Microsoft Dev Box
item.description: Microsoft Dev Box is introducing new capabilities to support greater customization and simplify Dev Box setup for development teams.
item.atom:content: Microsoft Dev Box is introducing new capabilities to support greater customization and simplify Dev Box setup for development teams.

item.title: Public preview: 3rd party support for Arm solutions in Azure Marketplace
item.description: Partners can now publish solutions built for Arm-based architecture to the Azure Marketplace. Enabling has broader support for ARM64 for all customers and partners in Azure.
item.atom:content: Partners can now publish solutions built for Arm-based architecture to the Azure Marketplace. Enabling has broader support for ARM64 for all customers and partners in Azure.

item.title: Introducing New Capabilities in Azure Deployment Environments
item.description: Azure Deployment Environments is adding new capabilities to deliver an end-to-end developer experience, broader infrastructure-as-code (IaC) template support, and the ability to control costs by configuring auto-delete schedules.
item.atom:content: Azure Deployment Environments is adding new capabilities to deliver an end-to-end developer experience, broader infrastructure-as-code (IaC) template support, and the ability to control costs by configuring auto-delete schedules.

item.title: Public preview: VM Hibernation
item.description: VMs can now be put into a hibernate state in which you don't pay for any VM usage, while the VM state can be saved and be restored at a later time.
item.atom:content: VMs can now be put into a hibernate state in which you don't pay for any VM usage, while the VM state can be saved and be restored at a later time.

item.title: Public preview: Azure VMSS Zonal Expansion
item.description: Zonal expansion for VMs and VM Scale Sets empowers users to smoothly transition their regionally configured VMs or VM scale sets into a zonal configuration across Azure availability zones, resulting an increased availability Service Level Agreement (SLA) from 99.95% to 99.99%.
item.atom:content: Zonal expansion for VMs and VM Scale Sets empowers users to smoothly transition their regionally configured VMs or VM scale sets into a zonal configuration across Azure availability zones, resulting an increased availability Service Level Agreement (SLA) from 99.95% to 99.99%.

item.title: GA: Azure Boost
item.description: Azure Boost is one of Microsoft Azure’s latest and most significant infrastructure innovations, enabling greater network and storage performance at scale, improves security, and reduced servicing impact.
item.atom:content: Azure Boost is one of Microsoft Azure’s latest and most significant infrastructure innovations, enabling greater network and storage performance at scale, improves security, and reduced servicing impact.

item.title: Public preview: New Generation AMD VMs - Dasv6/Easv6/Fasv6
item.description: Azure introduces the latest AMD-based VMs in public preview for the D, E, and F series VMs, built on the 4th Generation AMD EPYC™ (Genoa) CPU.
item.atom:content: Azure introduces the latest AMD-based VMs in public preview for the D, E, and F series VMs, built on the 4th Generation AMD EPYC™ (Genoa) CPU.

item.title: Experiment templates now available in Azure Chaos Studio
item.description: Create and customize an experiment from a template. Chaos Studio currently supports AAD Outage and Availability Zone Down scenarios.
item.atom:content: Create and customize an experiment from a template. Chaos Studio currently supports AAD Outage and Availability Zone Down scenarios.

item.title: General availability: Start and stop load (Azure Load Testing) faults in Azure Chaos Studio
item.description: Add a previously created load test (from Azure Load Testing) to your chaos experiment. Choose when exactly in your chaos experiment you would like to start and stop load.
item.atom:content: Add a previously created load test (from Azure Load Testing) to your chaos experiment. Choose when exactly in your chaos experiment you would like to start and stop load.

item.title: GA: Azure Functions supports .NET 8 in the isolated worker model
item.description: Azure Functions now supports .NET 8, using the isolated worker model.
item.atom:content: Azure Functions now supports .NET 8, using the isolated worker model.

item.title: General Availability: Ubuntu Server to Ubuntu Pro in-place upgrade now available
item.description: Upgrade from Ubuntu Server (16.04 or higher) to Ubuntu Pro on your existing Azure Virtual Machines (VMs) without redeployment or downtime.
item.atom:content: Upgrade from Ubuntu Server (16.04 or higher) to Ubuntu Pro on your existing Azure Virtual Machines (VMs) without redeployment or downtime.

item.title: Public Preview: Support for GraphQL APIs in Azure API Management Self-hosted Gateway
item.description: Customers now have the power to expose GraphQL APIs through Azure API Management's self-hosted gateway.
item.atom:content: Customers now have the power to expose GraphQL APIs through Azure API Management's self-hosted gateway.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Agent JSON log collection
item.description: Azure Monitoring Agent team has released for public preview JSON log collection. New collection types enable customers to migrate from other competing data collection services to Azure Monitor.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitoring Agent team has released for public preview JSON log collection. New collection types enable customers to migrate from other competing data collection services to Azure Monitor.

item.title: Public Preview: Support for gRPC APIs in Azure API Management Self-Hosted Gateway
item.description: We are thrilled to announce the public preview of gRPC support in Azure API Management through the self-hosted gateway. This exciting feature empowers customers to seamlessly manage their gRPC services as APIs within Azure API Management.
item.atom:content: We are thrilled to announce the public preview of gRPC support in Azure API Management through the self-hosted gateway. This exciting feature empowers customers to seamlessly manage their gRPC services as APIs within Azure API Management.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Alerts integration with Event Grid for Azure Key Vault system events
item.description: ​​​​​​​Azure Monitor alerts as a destination in Event Grid event subscriptions allow you to receive notification of critical events via action groups as Short Message Service (SMS), email, push notification, and more. You can leverage on the low latency event delivery of Event Grid with the flexibility and direct-to-customer notifications of Azure Monitor alerts.
item.atom:content: ​​​​​​​Azure Monitor alerts as a destination in Event Grid event subscriptions allow you to receive notification of critical events via action groups as Short Message Service (SMS), email, push notification, and more. You can leverage on the low latency event delivery of Event Grid with the flexibility and direct-to-customer notifications of Azure Monitor alerts.

item.title: Export cost details using the FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS)
item.description: Sign up for an early preview of Cost Management exports that provide cost data aligned to the open-source FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS).
item.atom:content: Sign up for an early preview of Cost Management exports that provide cost data aligned to the open-source FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS).

item.title: Azure support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 will end by 31 October 2024
item.description: If you have resources that interact with Azure services and still use TLS 1.1 or earlier, transition them to TLS 1.2 or later by 31 October 2024
item.atom:content: If you have resources that interact with Azure services and still use TLS 1.1 or earlier, transition them to TLS 1.2 or later by 31 October 2024

item.title: Public Preview: App Service End-to-end (E2E) Encryption for Linux Multi-tenant Resources
item.description: Encrypt traffic between multi-tenant App Service front-ends and workers using the new End-to-end (E2E) TLS Encryption (Preview) feature.
item.atom:content: Encrypt traffic between multi-tenant App Service front-ends and workers using the new End-to-end (E2E) TLS Encryption (Preview) feature.

item.title: General availability: Introducing NGads V620 Series VMs optimized for gaming scenarios
item.description: The NGads V620 Series are now in public preview in the East US2, Europe West and West US3 regions. This new series enables service providers to build differentiated cloud gaming experiences.
item.atom:content: The NGads V620 Series are now in public preview in the East US2, Europe West and West US3 regions. This new series enables service providers to build differentiated cloud gaming experiences.

item.title: Azure Monitor Logs archive provides up to 12 years of retention
item.description: Azure Monitor Logs extends archive retention to up to 12 years
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Logs extends archive retention to up to 12 years

item.title: General availability: Using a common port for public and private listeners
item.description: Easily manage public-facing and private-facing traffic on a common port.
item.atom:content: Easily manage public-facing and private-facing traffic on a common port.

item.title: General availability: Rate-limit rules for Application Gateway Web Application Firewall
item.description: Protect applications from abnormally high levels of traffic with rate-limit rules on Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.
item.atom:content: Protect applications from abnormally high levels of traffic with rate-limit rules on Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for early-November 2023
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in early-November 2023.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in early-November 2023.

item.title: Customer-Managed Keys (preview) integration with Azure Chaos Studio
item.description: Customer-Managed Keys (preview) integration with Azure Chaos Studio
item.atom:content: Customer-Managed Keys (preview) integration with Azure Chaos Studio

item.title: Azure NetApp Files datastores for Azure VMware Solution is available in US Government regions.
item.description: Azure NetApp Files datastores for Azure VMware Solution is available in US Government (VA, AZ) regions.
item.atom:content: Azure NetApp Files datastores for Azure VMware Solution is available in US Government (VA, AZ) regions.

item.title: Azure Red Hat OpenShift November 2023 updates
item.description: Azure Red Hat OpenShift now offers extended support, larger cluster size, and tagging support.
item.atom:content: Azure Red Hat OpenShift now offers extended support, larger cluster size, and tagging support.

item.title: Provider for running Karpenter on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: You can now use an open-source provider for running Karpenter on AKS to improve the efficiency and cost of running workloads on Kubernetes clusters.
item.atom:content: You can now use an open-source provider for running Karpenter on AKS to improve the efficiency and cost of running workloads on Kubernetes clusters.

item.title: GA: Kubernetes Event-driven Autoscaling (KEDA) Add-on for AKS
item.description: You can now use the KEDA add-on for AKS in production.
item.atom:content: You can now use the KEDA add-on for AKS in production.

item.title: GA: Kubernetes 1.28 support in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: You can now take advantage of Kubernetes 1.28 features in production.
item.atom:content: You can now take advantage of Kubernetes 1.28 features in production.

item.title: GA: Application routing add-on for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: You can now enable an ingress controller with SSL termination to quickly and securely access your applications in AKS
item.atom:content: You can now enable an ingress controller with SSL termination to quickly and securely access your applications in AKS

item.title: Public preview: Dual-stack networking in Azure CNI Overlay for AKS
item.description: You can now use dual-stack networking to communicate with services requiring IPv6 communication..
item.atom:content: You can now use dual-stack networking to communicate with services requiring IPv6 communication..

item.title: Public preview: Artifact streaming support in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: You can now scale your AKS workloads without having to fully wait for images to be pulled into the clusters.
item.atom:content: You can now scale your AKS workloads without having to fully wait for images to be pulled into the clusters.

item.title: Public preview: Image integrity support in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description: You can now ensure that only signed container images are deployed to your AKS clusters.
item.atom:content: You can now ensure that only signed container images are deployed to your AKS clusters.

item.title: Preview: Azure Container Storage in AKS
item.description: You can now easily deploy and use Azure Container Storage (in preview) seamlessly via the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) preview CLI experience.
item.atom:content: You can now easily deploy and use Azure Container Storage (in preview) seamlessly via the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) preview CLI experience.

item.title: Latency metrics for disks and performance metrics for temporary disks on Azure Virtual Machines
item.description: New latency metrics on OS, data and temporary disks are now available in preview, allowing you to see how long it takes to complete input/output (IO) requests to Azure Disks . In addition, new performance metrics for temporary disks are generally available now and allow users to see the IOPS, throughput and queue depth for virtual machines with temporary disks.
item.atom:content: New latency metrics on OS, data and temporary disks are now available in preview, allowing you to see how long it takes to complete input/output (IO) requests to Azure Disks . In addition, new performance metrics for temporary disks are generally available now and allow users to see the IOPS, throughput and queue depth for virtual machines with temporary disks.

item.title: Azure Elastic SAN updates: Snapshots, Security, and Usability
item.description: Introducing the latest update to Azure Elastic SAN (in preview), which now offers snapshot capabilities, enhanced security features, new features for a more simplified use experience, and an entirely new integration with Azure VMware Solution
item.atom:content: Introducing the latest update to Azure Elastic SAN (in preview), which now offers snapshot capabilities, enhanced security features, new features for a more simplified use experience, and an entirely new integration with Azure VMware Solution

item.title: General Availability: Azure Advisor recommendation improves the reliability of Azure Disks with Zone Redundant Storage
item.description: Enable disks to tolerate zonal failures without causing disruptions to your application. To learn more, visit Reliability recommendations - Azure Advisor | Microsoft Learn
item.atom:content: Enable disks to tolerate zonal failures without causing disruptions to your application. To learn more, visit Reliability recommendations - Azure Advisor | Microsoft Learn

item.title: Ability to add dynamic values in Alert’s custom fields
item.description: Alerts help you detect and address issues before users notice them by proactively notifying you when Azure Monitor data indicates there might be a problem with your infrastructure or application. We added to the Custom properties section in the alert payload ability to add dynamic value extracted from the alert payload, or a combination of both can be added to the alert notification payload.
item.atom:content: Alerts help you detect and address issues before users notice them by proactively notifying you when Azure Monitor data indicates there might be a problem with your infrastructure or application. We added to the Custom properties section in the alert payload ability to add dynamic value extracted from the alert payload, or a combination of both can be added to the alert notification payload.

item.title: Public preview: Application Gateway IPv6 support
item.description: Azure Application Gateway v2 enables dual-stack (IPv4 and IPv6) connectivity from the clients, providing more flexible and reliable access to the backend Applications.
item.atom:content: Azure Application Gateway v2 enables dual-stack (IPv4 and IPv6) connectivity from the clients, providing more flexible and reliable access to the backend Applications.

item.title: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus is available in 7 additional Azure regions
item.description: Azure Managed Prometheus was announced GA in May 2023 and is available in 19 regions, with this new update Azure Managed Prometheus will be available in 7 additional regions.
item.atom:content: Azure Managed Prometheus was announced GA in May 2023 and is available in 19 regions, with this new update Azure Managed Prometheus will be available in 7 additional regions.

item.title: Game Dev VM Marketplace Application will be retired on February 1st, 2024
item.description: Announcement of Azure Game Dev VM retirement
item.atom:content: Announcement of Azure Game Dev VM retirement

item.title: Public Preview: Azure integration with Canonical’s Snapshot Service for safe deployment
item.description: Azure Guest Patching Service and Azure Kubernetes Service will now apply the same package update from a specific date to all regions following safe deployment principles.
item.atom:content: Azure Guest Patching Service and Azure Kubernetes Service will now apply the same package update from a specific date to all regions following safe deployment principles.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions
item.description: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions and offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price performance
item.atom:content: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions and offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price performance

item.title: TLS 1.2 to become the minimum TLS version for Azure Storage
